substantive_content.summary: Quick mushroom identification - grey oyster with white edges, decurrent gills, offset stem. Likely Pearl Oyster (Pleurotus ostreatus var. columbinus).

projects.name: Mushroom Project
projects.details: Connects to January 2024 cultivation project - now identifying mushrooms (from cultivation or foraging)

for_instance_2_outcomes: Is this from his own cultivation or foraging?
Did the liquid culture experiments from January 2024 produce harvests?

notes: 9 months after intensive mushroom cultivation learning (Jan 2024), Bilal is now identifying mushrooms. Suggests sustained interest and possibly successful cultivation. October timing could be harvest season.
